modShortDescription: This mod adds a cessna 172 skyhawk plane. The controls are the same as the gyrocopter, but with slightly tweaked handling to make it feel more like a plane.
modDescription:
This mod adds a cessna 172 skyhawk plane. The controls are the same as the gyrocopter, but with slightly tweaked handling to make it feel more like a plane. It can be unlocked with grease monkey level 5 or by finding the schematics to craft it. You can also find the parts bundle for completing tier 5 quests.

## Features

* Faster flying speed
* Larger storage
* More fuel capacity
* Takes all [vehicle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/) mods
* 3 seats (with seating mod installed)

**Note:** This mod needs to be installed on both client and server for multiplayer.

## Changelog

**V1.1**

* Fixed an issue that caused the plane to be stuck moving forward if W was pressed.
* Tweaked the tilt angle of the plane so it can not tilt as much.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Zilox135/A20Modlets/tree/main/Cessna%20172%20Skyhawk%20Modlet)**
